chunk:
Haus Urban Double time Facial Toner (2020 formulation)

Brand: Haus Urban

Category: Toners/Astringents
book: 3096-Haus Urban Double time Facial Toner (2020 formulation)

chunk:
Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis (Organic Aloe) Leaf Juice, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Orange Blossom) Distillate, Avena Sativa (Organic Oatstraw) Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Glycerin, Salix Alba (Organic White Willow) Bark Extract, Polysorbate, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Essential Oil, Tetrasodium EDTA,
book: 3096-Haus Urban Double time Facial Toner (2020 formulation)

chunk: Directions: Apply to a cotton pad or directly on to face. If using a cotton pad, swipe from the inside of the face out. If applying directly, pat gently into skin. Follow up with Headshot Face Oil and/or Curtain Call Clarifying Moisturizer.
book: 3096-Haus Urban Double time Facial Toner (2020 formulation)

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 3096-Haus Urban Double time Facial Toner (2020 formulation)
